source_objects.title: Leadership
source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.

items.title: Leadership Skills Mastery Vol. 1: Leadership for 2019
items.headline: How to Become a Leader and Increase Your Leadership Skills, Influence and Power -Leadership Training, Qualities & Traits
objectives_summary: Rapidly BUILD Trust & Establish Lasting LOYALTY with Your Followers
DEVELOP a Compelling & Crystal Clear Leadership Vision
MAKE Better Decisions & Save Time by Learning to Think Like a Real Leader

items.title: Simple Strategies from Game Theory, for Leaders & Managers !

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami

items.headline: Practical Leadership Strategies from Game Theory, for Conflict Management, Competition and Interdependence !
objectives_summary: Learn Basic Concepts and Strategies from Game Theory for Leadership and Management
Apply these Concepts in situations of  Interdependence, Conflict and Competition for effective Strategic Thinking
Learn about many different types of Game Theory  situations and "games" and successful algorithms/startegies

items.title: 7 tips for new leaders - avoiding common mistakes
items.headline: Get your new leadership role off to a flying start
objectives_summary: At the end of my course, students will be able to feel their way into their new situation with sensitivity and purpose. They will be equipped to understand how to get the best from their team while focussing on changing things that matter. They will be able to offer leadership that is focused on creating high performing and empowered teams from the very beginning.

items.title: The Power of Deep Listening (Using Active Listening Skills)

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, psychologist, management consultant, executive coach
visible_instructors.title: Roger Kay Allen, Ph.D.
visible_instructors.name: Roger

items.headline: Improve Your Relationships, Influence, and Leadership by Using Active Listening Skills at Home and Work
objectives_summary: How to use active listening skills to get below the surface and hear what others are really saying
How to use listening skills to be accessible, attuned, and responsive to others
Recognition of your listening habits that close down communication

items.title: Emotional Intelligence Certification: Self Awareness Level 1
items.headline: Certification Course. Understand your personality with more Emotional Intelligence
objectives_summary: Deal with tough sitautions easier
Have completed one of four modules for their Emotional Intelligence certification

items.title: Ethics and Integrity, all about Deception and Dishonesty !

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami

items.headline: Insights and Lessons, from the Science and Research, on Human Dishonesty and Deception!
objectives_summary: Insights into Deception and Dishonesty, and the Science and Research behind it.
How, and when do we lie or cheat, and deceive others ? What are the factors that can affect this?
How, and when do we deceive ourselves ? What are the factors that can affect this?

items.title: 22 Practical Lessons in Leadership

visible_instructors.job_title: Your Mobile University for Successful Living
visible_instructors.title: Street Smart University
visible_instructors.name: Street Smart

items.headline: Steve Jobs, Bill Gates and David Beckham. Know what they did right as leaders and what you can learn from them!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be equipped with actionable steps to improve your leadership skills.
You will learn how to bring leadership practices into your daily life.
You will realize that leadership is a skill that can be acquired.

items.title: Decision Making: Mistakes, in Probability and Statistics !

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami

items.headline: Lessons for Leaders and Managers: Learn and Avoid the common Misconceptions and Mistakes, in Probability & Statistics.
objectives_summary: The common misconceptions and mistakes made in Probability and Statistics, for everyday Judgements and Decisions
The Psychological Biases and Fallacies that make us assume and conclude wrongly, when using Probability and Statistics
How to try and minimize such pitfalls, and use probability and statistics more effectively while making decisions.

items.title: Business Leadership & Management: How To Be A Better Leader
items.headline: Business Leadership: Creating Impact & Delivering Results. Business Leadership Skills & Strategies In Management.
objectives_summary: Focus efforts in the first 100 days including the markets, customers, employees to succeed
Understand the framework for developing a strategy for success
SWOT Analysis and Pestel Analysis

items.title: The Complete Growth Mindset Course - The Mindset for Success
items.headline: Build a Growth Mindset for Your Organization and Yourself - Leadership for Life Success - Learn Habits to be Successful
objectives_summary: Growth Mindset
Mindset Improvement
Optimism

items.title: Public Speaking: Skills & Tools for Presenting for Impact
items.headline: Public Speaking: Presentation Skills for Impact! Power Points that work, prep tools, techniques, learn to engage & more!
objectives_summary: Present with impact
Present confidentally

items.title: Lead High Performing Teams
items.headline: Leading through motivation, trust and great communication
objectives_summary: Remove the things that dissatisfy from the workplace
Create an environment that supports motivation
Make people feel smart

items.title: The Complete Course on Leadership, Execution & Resilience
items.headline: Understand leadership theories, master leadership skills & acquire expertise in global leadership
objectives_summary: Master leadership skills in different environments (at work, in your company, during group projects etc.)
Understand the 4 main leadership theories and their historic backgrounds
Discover the power of human psychology and influence (and you will know how to use both for your advantage)

items.title: Unlock your passion to live a fulfilling and content life

visible_instructors.job_title: Self-Enrichment Author | Business Consultant | Results Coach
visible_instructors.title: Rohit Sethi
visible_instructors.name: Rohit

items.headline: Find your passion and fight for it. Get inspired. Be independent of other peoples’ opinions. Be a master at your gift.
objectives_summary: Identify what they are passionate about
Understand how they can go from ‘having an interest’ to ‘being a master/ an expert’ in that area
Become independent of other people’s opinions

items.title: Public Speaking Mastery
items.headline: Ultimate Guide To Turning Your Shyness To Boldness And Present Better
objectives_summary: Understand public speaking foundation.
Understand the benefits of public speaking and its application to everyday life success.
Develop a speech

items.title: Learn to Lead - The Leadership Journey
items.headline: Be a leader of your Future!
objectives_summary: Get an in depth understanding of Leadership and its importance in today’s world.
Learn general tips and tricks on how to curate effective leadership plan.
Learn how to step out of their comfort zone with self awareness and confidence.
